manualPage.mainTitle: New here? Here's how to use our service step by step
manualPage.description: This page is designed to help first-time visitors understand the flow of how to use the service. Through a diagram layout, you can visually follow each step and eliminate confusion by reading the explanations. A tutorial machine is also provided so you can try it yourself comfortably.

learning.title: What you can learn from this page
learning.item1: Visually understand the entire process of using the hacking lab.
learning.item2: Click each step to get detailed explanations via popup or enlarged view.
learning.item3: Naturally learn the service by following the manual step by step.
learning.item4: Experience the real flow using the tutorial machine.

manualPage.tryTutorial: Now try the tutorial to learn how to play with a machine.
